review_blob: My favorite beer.  Old reliable.  The textbook American Pale Ale.  Goes down easy.  Just the right amount of hoppiness.
Nice smooth IPA.  Not as bitter as most IPAs.  I love a good bitter IPA, but this was a nice change of pace.  Nice hoppy aroma and flavor.  Goes down easy.  I love the stuff.
beer_name: Terrapin Side Project Hop Shortage Ale
